text.section:
A person who acts in good faith is not civilly liable for:
Making a report under § 7-1005 of the Health - General Article;
Participating in an investigation arising out of a report under § 7-1005 of the Health - General Article; or
Participating in a judicial proceeding arising out of a report under § 7-1005 of the Health - General Article.
This section does not grant any immunity for an abuser who makes a report or participates in the investigation or proceeding.
